summary: Software Engineer with 10+ (3 years in academia) years of experience with demonstrated history of working in the R&D, Defence&Space and Healthcare industries. Strong engineering professional with a Master of Science (MS) focused in high level control design of autonomous systems. Working both autonomously and harmoniously in a team. Customer oriented and getting things done minded.

projects.title: Random Number Tester Circuit Design
projects.description:
Random number generators (RNGs) are one of the basic cryptographic primitives that generate random quantities for cryptosystems. There are various types of tests to decide either these numbers are really random or not. FIPS 140 is one of the standart that contains these set of rules. It is originally used to accredit cryptographic modules. I developed a digital circuit using VHDL to test these random numbers. The tests are handled with ISIM simulator (Xilinx).

Keywords: Vhdl, Circuit Design, Fpga, Random Number Test, FIPS 140, Xilinx ISE

projects.title: Building a Smart and Cheap Home Automation System
projects.description:
This is a hobby project of my own which I’ve always wanted to work on. With the increase
demand for smart houses, there are some companies which are developing products to provide expandable and convenient solutions such as controlling and monitoring the insides of buildings. I did some digging, I see that these hardware systems are highly fashonable and feasible but also expensive. So, I decided to build from scratch and develop a cheap and smart home automation system based on the hot and rising new technology which is called IOT(Internet of Things). The developed system will be consisting of a microcontroller based hardware component which provide sensor data such as temperature, gas, humidity ratio, light , movement detection, door&window opening and a microprocessor based hardware that control the all sensor network.

Keywords: Embedded Systems, Arduino, Raspberry Pi, Openhab, IOT, WiFi, Sensor Networks, C/C++, Web Services, Mqtt, Mosquitto

projects.title: Turkish Utility Helicopter – (T70) Avionics Software Development Project
projects.description:
This project is one of the biggest projects that is being managed by the Avionics Software Development and Design Department of ASELSAN M.G.E.O Division. I’m taking part as an Avionics Software Development Engineer. I was responsible for writing SW requirements and coding the IP protocol interfaces (TCP, UDP, SNMP, SNTP and FTP) and avionics protocol interface (MIL-STD-1553) of IVHMS (Integrated Health Management System) module which will be served as a “black box” and will be used for both “on flight” and “after flight” maintenance jobs.
 
Keywords: Avionics Software, Requirements, Integrity RTOS, C/C++, IBM Rational Doors, IBM Clearquest, IBM Rational Rhapsody, Ethernet, MIL-STD-1553

projects.title: Software&Hardware Design and Development of a mini UAV
projects.description:
Hardware and software development of a quadrotor. A workfellow of mine(Veli Bayar) and I are developing our own quadrotor from the very beginning. Research and development process is still going on.

Here are some footages of the current situation:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ds5JtVFWBYU
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UnqCWodcRCk

Keywords: C, C++, UAV, Intelligent Systems, ROS, Embedded Programming, Atmel Cortex M4 Microcontrollers

projects.title: An Intelligent Control Unit for Mobile Robot Systems[ATEKS]
projects.description:
A general purpose electronic control card is developed with the project. The aim of this work is to use this card for any mobile robot platforms which are ROS(Robot Operating System) compatible. The developed prototype is tested on an electrical wheelchair to make it an intelligent mobile robot. 

[Project is concluded succcesfully]

- An ATEKS has been sold to Afyon Kocatepe University Mechactronics Engineering for research purposes.

Keywords: C, C++, Robotics, Intelligent Systems, ROS, Linux, Sensor Based Control Algorithms, Embedded Programming, Embedded Linux, Qt, TI Cortex M3 Microcontrollers, Firmware development(baremetal)

profile_positions.description:
Taking part in the projects of Philips Healthcare MDC department as a software engineer:

• Software development and maintenance on Allura and Azurion product lines using C, C++ (Legacy and Modern), Perl, Python, Batch languages.
• Contribution to migration of real-time embedded positioning software from VxWorks 6.7 to VxWorks7.
• Working hand in hand with procurement engineers and project managers for 3rd party software
development tasks.
• Working in a SAFE (Scaled Agile Framework) environment with 6 software, 3 hardware and 1
system teams.
• VxWorks kernel configuration management and driver integration tasks for various products.
• Developed a boot sector installer for a multi-stage boot loader for common use in department,
helped reducing license costs.
